original_title: Announcing new date for LG polls delayed to next week
original_body_lines: The new date for the Local Government elections would be announced before March 9, the Elections Commission announced today.
The Commission said a suitable date for the LG polls would be decided following a discussion with the Finance Ministry and other relevant institutions based on today's Supreme Court ruling.
The Elections Commission earlier said the new date for the LG polls would be announced today.(Ajith Siriwardana)
